verbs.description: SALT LAKE CITY -- Utah Gov. Gary Herbert [V: is] expressing alarm at a potential trade war as a result of rising tariffs . In a rare tweetstorm of his own , the governor spoke out against President Trump 's decision to raise tariffs on some imports .
